question: What of the following Human Development Index comprises with literacy rates, life expectancy at birth?
option1: Gross Domestic Product per head in US dollars
option2: Gross Domestic Product per head at real purchasing power
option3: Gross National Product in US dollars
option4: National Income per head in US dollars
answer: National Income per head in US dollars
explanation: HDI is a statistical tool which measures the country\'s overall achievement in its socio-economic dimension. It is being prepared and published by the United Nations Development Programme. The basic components of HDI are Health (longevity of life), Education and living standards (Gross national income per capita).
